text:
sa#hasAvaqn pari#ShTA vaqGAya# BUma harivaH parAqdai | 
trAya#sva nO &vRuqkEBiq-rvarU#thaiq stava# priqyAsa#H sUqriShu# syAma ||
ana#vastEq rathaqmaSvA#ya takShaqn-tvaShTAq vajra#M puruhUta dyuqmanta$M |
braqhmANaq indra#M maqhaya#ntO aqrkairava#rddhayaqnnaha#yEq hantaq vA u# || 
vRuShNEq yat tEq vRuSha#NO aqrkamarcAqnindraq grAvA#NOq adi#tiH saqjOShA$H |
aqnaqSvAsOq yE paqvayO#&raqthA indrE#ShitA aqByava#rttaMtaq dasyUn# || 51
(vRuqtraqhatyE&nu#-gAyaqtriNO$-&dhvaqrANA$M-parAqvatOq-&syA-maqShTAca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A12)

Prasna kOrvai with starting Padams of 1 tO 12 Anuvaakams :-
(saMtvA# si~jcAmi-dhruqvO$-&syaqgnirmA#-baqr.hiShOq&ha-mA pyA#yatAq-maga#nmaq-yathAq vai-yO vai SraqddhAM- praqjApa#tiqryaj~jAn-dhruqvO#sItyA#haq-yO vai sa#ptadaqSa-mindra#M ~MvOq-dvAda#Sa | )

kOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 series of Panchaatis :-
(saMtvA#-baqr.hiShOq&haM-~MyathAq vA-EqvaM ~MviqdvA-~jCrauSha#Tth-sAhasAvaq-nnEka#pa~jcAqSat | )

First and Last Padam of Sixth praSnam:-
(saMtvA#-si~jcAmiq dasyUn# | )

|| hari#H OM ||
|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakANDE ShaShThaH praSnaH samAptaH ||
=========================================================

1.7	prathamakANDE saptamaH praSnaH yAjamAna-brAhmaNaM
